Package business.entities.character.cleric

Class Cleric

java.lang.Object
business.entities.character.Character
business.entities.character.cleric.Cleric
Direct Known Subclasses:
Paladin
public class Cleric extends Character
Class that represents a Cleric, extends from Character.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cleric

      public Cleric(Character that)
      Constructs a new Cleric object based on the given character.
      Parameters:
      that - the character to create the Cleric from

  • Method Details

    • canEvolve

      public boolean canEvolve()
      Checks if the Cleric character can evolve. The Cleric can evolve if its level is greater than the maximum Cleric level.
      Specified by:
      canEvolve in class Character
      Returns:
      true if the Cleric can evolve, false otherwise

    • evolve

      public Character evolve()
      Evolves the Cleric character to a higher class. If the current level is within the range of 5 to 10, the Cleric evolves into a Paladin. Otherwise, the Cleric remains the same.
      Specified by:
      evolve in class Character
      Returns:
      the evolved character, which is a Paladin if applicable, otherwise the same Cleric

    • rollInitiative

      public void rollInitiative(Dice dice)
      Rolls the initiative for the Cleric character using the given dice. The initiative is calculated by rolling a d10 dice and adding the Cleric's spirit value. The calculated initiative value is then set as the Cleric's initiative.
      Specified by:
      rollInitiative in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice object used for rolling

    • doPreparationAction

      public int doPreparationAction(Dice ignored)
      Performs the preparation action for the Cleric character using the given dice. The preparation action returns the value of the preparation stat.
      Specified by:
      doPreparationAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      ignored - the dice object (ignored for Cleric)
      Returns:
      the value of the preparation stat

    • isSelfPreparationAction

      public boolean isSelfPreparationAction()
      Checks if the preparation action of the Cleric character is self-preparation. The Cleric's preparation action is not self-preparation.
      Specified by:
      isSelfPreparationAction in class Character
      Returns:
      false since the Cleric's preparation action is not self-preparation

    • healsInBattle

      public boolean healsInBattle()
      Checks if the Cleric character can heal in battle. The Cleric can heal in battle.
      Overrides:
      healsInBattle in class Character
      Returns:
      true since the Cleric can heal in battle

    • doBattleAction

      public int doBattleAction(Dice dice, boolean needHealing)
      Performs the battle action for the Cleric character using the given dice and healing requirement. The battle action can be either a heal or an attack based on the healing requirement. If healing is needed, the Cleric performs the battle heal action. Otherwise, the Cleric rolls attack dice and calculates damage based on the dice result and the Cleric's spirit value. If the attack is critical, the damage is multiplied by the critical multiplier.
      Specified by:
      doBattleAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice object used for rolling
      needHealing - true if healing is needed, false for attacking
      Returns:
      the calculated damage or the result of the battle heal action

    • getDamageType

      public String getDamageType()
      Retrieves the damage type of the Cleric character.
      Specified by:
      getDamageType in class Character
      Returns:
      the damage type of the Cleric

    • doShortRestAction

      public int doShortRestAction(Dice dice)
      Performs the short rest action for the Cleric character using the given dice. The short rest action is equivalent to performing a battle action with healing requirement set to true. The value returned represents the increase in current HP after the short rest action.
      Specified by:
      doShortRestAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice object used for rolling
      Returns:
      the increase in current HP after the short rest action

    • passiveAbility

      public float passiveAbility()
      Retrieves the passive ability value of the Cleric character. The Cleric does not have a passive ability.
      Specified by:
      passiveAbility in class Character
      Returns:
      the passive ability value of the Cleric

    • getPreparationAction

      public String getPreparationAction()
      Retrieves the name of the preparation action for the Cleric character.
      Specified by:
      getPreparationAction in class Character
      Returns:
      the name of the preparation action

      public int getPreparationStatValue()
      Retrieves the value of the preparation stat for the Cleric character.
      Specified by:
      getPreparationStatValue in class Character
      Returns:
      the value of the preparation stat

    • getBattleAction

      public String getBattleAction()
      Retrieves the name of the battle action for the Cleric character. If healing is needed, the battle action is the battle heal action. Otherwise, it is the attack action.
      Specified by:
      getBattleAction in class Character
      Returns:
      the name of the battle action

    • getBattleEffect

      public String getBattleEffect()
      Retrieves the effect of the battle action for the Cleric character. If healing is needed, the battle effect is the heal effect. Otherwise, it is the attack effect.
      Specified by:
      getBattleEffect in class Character
      Returns:
      the effect of the battle action

    • getShortRestAction

      public String getShortRestAction()
      Retrieves the name of the short rest action for the Cleric character.
      Specified by:
      getShortRestAction in class Character
      Returns:
      the name of the short rest action
